definition: to pack one's things and leave
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll
plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station
to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: One in three workers will be gone.
sentences.chinese: 三分之一的工人會捲鋪蓋走人。

sentences.english: If they didn't, they were going home.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有，就得捲鋪蓋走人。

sentences.english: If you are late tomorrow, then you will pack yourself off .
sentences.chinese: 如果明天你遲到的話，那麼捲鋪蓋走人。
